Rio Hondo College - Environment: NEW-DEV New-DEV Environment
Review and acknowledge the following upgrade-specific instructions and enter any requested parameters.
Overview
****************************************
BANNER PAYROLL 8.32.1
****************************************

NOTE: Any upgrade issues discovered and reported to the ActionLine subsequent
to the posting of this release will be documented in the "Banner Human Resources 8.32.1 Upgrade Issues"
Article KB000511055 and made available via the Ellucian Customer Center web site:
(http://login.ellucian.com).
It is required that you check this document prior to applying
the release by querying for Article KB000511055.

***************************************
Self-service
***************************************************
BANNER PAYROLL 8.32.1
***************************************************

Banner 8 Self-Service will enter Sustaining Support on October 1, 2025. Sustaining Support will cover ONLY critical vulnerability patches until December 31, 2025. No further updates, including functional defect fixes or regulatory updates will be available after October 1, 2025.
Ellucian strongly recommends customers finalize plans to transition off Banner 8 Self-Service now. Please reach out to your Customer Success Manager with any questions.
